Text: Thanks for sharing this movie.  People should know though, that there is (1) a watermark that shows throughout the movie and (2) the picture and audio quality is not great, but maybe that's obvious from the small filesize?  Anyway, it's better than nothing since the movie is very difficult to find in shops.
hey...its been quite a while since i requested the english subs. I find this movie very interesting. Could the seeder or anyone pl provide the subs. Appreciate it.
